\begin{question}
Determine the types and values of each of the following variables.
\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]
^^I\item \verb|int* ip, &r = ip;|
^^I\item \verb|int i, *ip = 0;|
^^I\item \verb|int* ip, ip2;|
\end{enumerate}
\end{question}
